reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be well-made and comfortable, with one noting it's not too tight. The dress is flattering, accentuating curves nicely and hugging the body, while being thick enough to look nice. Customers appreciate its warmth, noting it's perfect for winter wear, and its stretchiness, with one mentioning it's stretchy enough to hug the body. Customers describe the fabric as wonderfully soft and heavy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and comfortable!
items.body: This may be the most comfortable dress Iâ€™ve ever owned. The length was exactly what I was looking for in a midi dress. The material is so soft and thick enough that the dress is not see through at all. It can be dressed up or dressed down. I wore it with heeled boots but I feel like it would also be cute to wear to work or out with white tennis shoes. Iâ€™m 5â€™7 and 135lbs and I got a medium. It fits perfectâ€¦exactly what I was looking for! Read more
items.author: Mandy Townsend

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels good. Looks good.
items.body: Fits perfectly. Very comfortable. 149lbs and 5â€™6â€ tall. I bought a medium in red. Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Sweater Dress
items.body: My new favorite sweater dress! I ordered the Red Apricot and am obsessed with this color. I normally wear size XS but the smallest size they had was S. This turned out to be fine - great fit, perfect length. For reference I am 5â€™7â€, 108 lbs, 32/24/32. Read more
items.author: Molly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: I got this dress for engagement pictures. I have worn it so many other times. I love this so much. It is not see through at all. It stretches well. I love how it does not bunch up like other sweater dresses I have bought. It is thick and great quality. I am tall so being able to find a dress that actually sits where it is supposed to like this one was so great! If you are looking for a nice sweater dress this is the one! It does not shrink when washed! Read more
items.author: Baileigh Miller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning ðŸ¤©
items.body: Ah h a flattering dress that fits so well! I got the blue and it just complements in a beautiful way. The fabric is very soft and not too thick, so I could pair with a light long cardigan if desired. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cozy and cute !! â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater dress! Itâ€™s soft, cozy, and the midi length is just right. I wore it for our baby announcement photos and felt so comfortable and cute the whole time. It photographed beautifully and made the moment feel even more special. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: morgan alexis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised when trying on the dress for the first time. I wasn't sure that I liked it at first but it grew on me. I haven't worn it yet but am looking foward to the cooler weather when I will be able to finally wear it. The material is actually pretty nice, so I hope it holds up in the wash. The size was true to size for me. I usually wear a small or an extra small in ladies wear, depending on the brand. The length was perfect on me too and I will probably pair this with a pair of ankle boots, looked too odd with my long boots. I also tried folding down the collar a little, which also worked. I got a really good deal on this at the time of purchase, so it they go down again, I may buy this in a different colour. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality dress
items.body: This is such a nice dress. Such good quality. I ended up returning though because it just wasn't flattering on me with it being more fitted. It is also a little longer than expected. The fabric is soft heavy and nice. Read more
items.author: Ariana Vander Vries

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Rust, Blue, Apricot, Rose, Black, Olive, Wine Red, Pink, White, Red Apricot, Purple, Royal Blue, Light Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
